item.title: Southall
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post Southall appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Our Campus

Southall

The Southall location is on Southall High Street and in one of west Londons most diverse areas. Our Southall location is based in a thriving community full of street food stalls, music venues and local businesses. The building itself is located in the heart of the district, with easy access to transport links and local amenities. With cutting edge IT facilities and comprehensive study resources, it makes for an unforgettable study experience.

Contacts

+44 (0)203 870 6666

info@rcl.ac.uk

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

School of Computing and AI

School of Allied Health

Course Types

Higher National Diplomas

Foundation Year Routes

Foundation Degrees

Bachelors Degrees

Top Up Degrees

FACILITIES

Our Southall location is a modern facility, surrounded by a network of local businesses. We have a range of resources available to students to help them enjoy and thrive.

TRAVEL/TRANSPORT

As our Southall location is near a busy High Street, the Southall Railway Station is the closest Train Station to the campus. In addition, there are multiple bus routes to help students travel to and from the location including the, 95, 105, 120, 195, 207, 427, 607, E5 and H32 buses.

ADDRESS

Bishops House
39-47 High Street
Southall
London
UB1 3HF

Southall Location

Why study with Regent College London Southall?

We may be a little biased here, but Regent College London is the place to study. From thorough student loan guidance to flexible classes, weve created a little list of reasons to study with us:

Flexible Study Classes: Morning, Evening and Weekend Classes help you fit your studies around busy life commitments.

High Experienced Tutors: We have some of the best tutors within the Education Sector whom deliver engaging lessons to our students. In addition, small class sizes ensure 1-2-1 advice and help when needed.

Campus Locations with Strong Transport Links: Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital in Wembley, Kingsbury, Harrow, Southall and Central London; all with a tube station or bus stop located 5 Minutes or less from them. We have modern campuses with excellent facilities and resources for our students. Our campuses are based in vibrant communities with great culture and exciting lunch spots!

Student Support: We have phenomenal student support teams across all locations to help with any queries from student loans, UCAS Applications, Careers Advice and general questions.

Read more

Regent Digital Services

How to Apply?

Studying at Regent College

Student Advice Hub

What our students say

Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

Radostina Todorova Dimitrova

BA (Hons) Business Management

My overall experience has been fantastic! I’ve made a great group of friends. My class size is small and we have a laugh with the tutors. The lessons are completely related to the job you want to do, and the course has made me rethink on what career I want because it leads you to many high paying jobs! I’ve learnt laws, legislation and skills that will benefit me in my career and its only my first year here! During the coronavirus, teaching has continued and tutors have been in regular contact to make sure I’m OK and to check if I need help. They’ve even worked out of hours to provide one to one support to get me through assignments! They’ve really gone above and beyond!

Shirley Edokpolor

BSc (Hons) in Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

I will strongly recommend Regent College as they have shown me how to be confident in myself and also taught me how to achieve my aims and goals in my chosen career.

Neima Abdi Daher

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. Ive being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. Its so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

Stefania Voevod

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I really love the teachers, they take the extra time and effort to help me. The college helps me to keep my dreams alive. It is a warm place where i feel very comfortable. The environment is really supportive. And most importantly, the teachers made me realise that to achieve something one requires vision, self-motivation, determination and hard work.

Rashed Haider

BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

Andreea-Loredana Costea

BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

The lecturers teach and explain modules in the best way possible so that students can understand. The recruitment staff are very nice and very helpful every time you have a problem. Quick problem solving and efficient service from the start to the end at Regent College London.

Galin Gavrailov

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

I would recommend the college because of the professionalism shown by the tutors and the attention they give to us students, so we thatcan progress. They are also very friendly and when we dont understand something they spend time to explain the concepts to us properly.

Abdirahman Farah

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

Csilla Raduly

HND

I choose Regent College to study because it was recommended to me by a friend, who attends here. Enrolling and starting studying went very smoothly. I am very happy I got the chance to take the HND Business class, as my plan for the future is to run my own business. I am looking forward to making the best of this class and continue my studies to get my Bachelors Degree. Regent College offers great teachers, kind and polite. It also brought new friends, which I am grateful for.

 

The post Southall appeared first on Regent College London.

item.title: Kingsbury
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post Kingsbury appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Our Campus

Kingsbury

The Regent College London Kingsbury location is on Valley Drive and is home to modern facilities within an incredibly vibrant area in North West London. With a dedicated Higher Education student suite, lounge area and IT lab, the building provides a learning environment that is both academically and socially engaging. You will be sure to find the perfect spots to socialise with friends close to the location, whilst on facilities on the location aid team and group study sessions.

Contacts

+44 (0)203 870 6666

info@rcl.ac.uk

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

School of Allied Health

Course Types

Foundation Year Routes

Bachelors Degrees

Top Up Degrees

FACILITIES

Our Kingsbury location is a modern facility, with good transport links and surrounded by a network of local businesses. We have a range of resources available to students to help them enjoy and thrive.

TRAVEL/TRANSPORT

As our Kingsbury location is near a busy High Street, there are a range of Transport Links available to it. The closest Tube Stations to London Road are: Kingsbury Station, Kenton Station and Preston Road Station. All stations above offer a range of Tube Lines including, Metropolitan, Bakerloo and Jubilee Lines. In addition, there are multiple bus routes to help students travel to and from the location, including the, 83, 204, 324, 653 and 683 buses.

ADDRESS

Masons House
1-3 Valley Drive
London
NW9 9NG

Kingsbury Location

Why study with Regent College London – Kingsbury?

We may be a little biased here, but Regent College London is the place to study. From thorough student loan guidance to flexible classes, weve created a little list of reasons to study with us:

Flexible Study Classes: Morning, Evening and Weekend Classes help you fit your studies around busy life commitments.

High Experienced Tutors: We have some of the best tutors within the Education Sector whom deliver engaging lessons to our students. In addition, small class sizes ensure 1-2-1 advice and help when needed.

Campus Locations with Strong Transport Links: Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital in Wembley, Kingsbury, Harrow, Southall and Central London; all with a tube station or bus stop located 5 Minutes or less from them. We have modern buildings with excellent facilities and resources for our students. Our campus locations are based in vibrant communities with great culture and exciting lunch spots!

Student Support: We have phenomenal student support teams across all locations to help with any queries from student loans, UCAS Applications, Careers Advice and general questions.

Read more

Regent Digital Services

How to Apply?

Studying at Regent College

Student Advice Hub

What our students say

Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

Snezana Radojkovic

BA (Hons) Business Management

My academic needs are fully met within a collaborative, encouraging and friendly environment. The importance of education is addressed in well structured program, adequately chosen modules and engaging classes. I do recommend Regent College London.

Andreia Craciun

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I have gained courage to speak to people and I have more confidence in myself. I received a lot of help from my teachers and it was really interesting meeting new people and making new friends. I’m happy that I came to Regent College London to study, it was the right place to come and I would definitely recommend it.

Radostina Todorova Dimitrova

BA (Hons) Business Management

My overall experience has been fantastic! I’ve made a great group of friends. My class size is small and we have a laugh with the tutors. The lessons are completely related to the job you want to do, and the course has made me rethink on what career I want because it leads you to many high paying jobs! I’ve learnt laws, legislation and skills that will benefit me in my career and its only my first year here! During the coronavirus, teaching has continued and tutors have been in regular contact to make sure I’m OK and to check if I need help. They’ve even worked out of hours to provide one to one support to get me through assignments! They’ve really gone above and beyond!

Neima Abdi Daher

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. Ive being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. Its so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

Jeremiah Adekunle Adesanya

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

Excellent educational service with good customer service skills and great experience in student support management.

Prakash Mandalia

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

Stefania Voevod

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I really love the teachers, they take the extra time and effort to help me. The college helps me to keep my dreams alive. It is a warm place where i feel very comfortable. The environment is really supportive. And most importantly, the teachers made me realise that to achieve something one requires vision, self-motivation, determination and hard work.

Teodora Dinoc

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

I am very happy with Regent College London and the way in which my courses are being delivered online. The structure of the courses is well organized and I am engaged with my teachers and colleagues. Definitely I will recommend Regent College to anyone interested to pursue their studies.

Abdirahman Farah

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

The post Kingsbury appeared first on Regent College London.

item.title: Wembley
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post Wembley appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Our Campus

Wembley

Based on London Road, The Regent College London; Wembley location is just a few minutes walk away from the iconic Wembley Stadium, world-famous SSE Wembley Arena, lunch hotspot Boxpark Wembley and bustling London Designer Outlet.

As our Wembley location is in a very sociable and diverse community, Regent College London have established strong connections with local businesses and organisations, which include: Local Libraries, Brent Civic Centre and Local Gym Facilities. All of which give students the opportunity to expand their social and academic connections.

Contacts

+44 (0)203 870 6666

info@rcl.ac.uk

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

Course Types

Higher National Diplomas

Foundation Degrees

FACILITIES

Our Wembley college location is a well-equipped facility, with good transport links and surrounded by a network of local businesses. We have a range of resources available to students to help them enjoy and thrive.

TRAVEL/TRANSPORT

As our Wembleylocation is perfectly situated at the centre of Wembley, there are a range of Transport Links available to it. The closest Tube Stations to London Road are: Wembley Central Station, Wembley Park Station, North Wembley Station and Alperton Station. All stations offer a range of Tube Lines including, Metropolitan, Piccadilly, Overground and Bakerloo Lines. In addition, there are multiple bus routes to help students travel to and from the college location, including the, 83, 223, 224, 92, 182, 79, 204 and 18 buses.

ADDRESS

Madison House
24-28 London Road
Wembley
Middlesex
HA9 7EX

Wembley Location

Why study with Regent College London – Wembley?

We may be a little biased here, but Regent College London is the place to study. From thorough student loan guidance to flexible classes, weve created a little list of reasons to study with us:

Flexible Study Classes: Morning, Evening and Weekend Classes help you fit your studies around busy life commitments.

High Experienced Tutors: We have some of the best tutors within the Education Sector whom deliver engaging lessons to our students. In addition, small class sizes ensure 1-2-1 advice and help when needed.

Campus Locations with Strong Transport Links: Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital in Wembley, Kingsbury, Harrow, Southall and Central London; all with a tube station or bus stop located 5 Minutes or less from them. We have modern buildings with excellent facilities and resources for our students. Our campus locations are based in vibrant communities with great culture and exciting lunch spots!

Student Support: We have phenomenal student support teams across all locations to help with any queries from student loans, UCAS Applications, Careers Advice and general questions.

Read more

Regent Digital Services

How to Apply?

What our students say

Snezana Radojkovic

BA (Hons) Business Management

My academic needs are fully met within a collaborative, encouraging and friendly environment. The importance of education is addressed in well structured program, adequately chosen modules and engaging classes. I do recommend Regent College London.

Radostina Todorova Dimitrova

BA (Hons) Business Management

My overall experience has been fantastic! I’ve made a great group of friends. My class size is small and we have a laugh with the tutors. The lessons are completely related to the job you want to do, and the course has made me rethink on what career I want because it leads you to many high paying jobs! I’ve learnt laws, legislation and skills that will benefit me in my career and its only my first year here! During the coronavirus, teaching has continued and tutors have been in regular contact to make sure I’m OK and to check if I need help. They’ve even worked out of hours to provide one to one support to get me through assignments! They’ve really gone above and beyond!

Prakash Mandalia

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

Rashed Haider

BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

Galin Gavrailov

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

I would recommend the college because of the professionalism shown by the tutors and the attention they give to us students, so we thatcan progress. They are also very friendly and when we dont understand something they spend time to explain the concepts to us properly.

Abdirahman Farah

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

Winsome Reid

HND

I think the course so far has exceeded my expectations, the teachers really do explain things well. If I dont understand something, I know that I can go to any of my teachers and they will be able to break it down to me and offer me the additional support that I need. The best part of the course so far has been meeting like minded people, the teaching and, of course, the content of the course. I really enjoy learning about the different components of business and how businesses function optimally to generate revenue. I would definitely recommend the course and encourage anyone interested in business to go forward and study a HND with Regent College London.

 

Lily Ndosimao

BSc Health and Social Care (UOB)

It is my first year at Regent college studying a degree in Health and Social Care. The teaching is excellent and the environment is so clean which makes it a better place to study. I honestly like the staff because they are so polite. I am so lucky to studying here honestly.

 

Csilla Raduly

HND

I choose Regent College to study because it was recommended to me by a friend, who attends here. Enrolling and starting studying went very smoothly. I am very happy I got the chance to take the HND Business class, as my plan for the future is to run my own business. I am looking forward to making the best of this class and continue my studies to get my Bachelors Degree. Regent College offers great teachers, kind and polite. It also brought new friends, which I am grateful for.

 

Ameen Olorunnimbe

HND

I am very happy that I chose Regent College London. It is a fantastic college. The tutors are ready to listen to the students and they teach you to their best ability. I have enjoyed every moment here. They have great facilities, books and computers. I was lucky to have made Regent College London my choice. Regent College London is in my heart. (Successfully enrolled onto the 3rd year of a business course at University of West London)

 

The post Wembley appeared first on Regent College London.

item.title: Central London
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post Central London appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Our Campus

Central London

Our Central London location is situated on Great Titchfield Street and surrounded by the best lunch spots, global businesses and breathtaking architecture. At our central London location, you will be in awe of its surroundings on a daily basis, finding gems of London around every corner you turn. The world-renowned BT Tower is a stones throw away and you can even see its bright lights from our classrooms.

With only a 5 minute walk to from the famous shopping districts, Oxford Street and Regent Street and providing bright Christmas lights around December, you will have a great time snapping away shots of the beautiful scenery. By immersing yourself into the Citys rich culture, you will continually be inspired and motivated to achieve the very best you can at Regent College London.

Contacts

+44 (0)203 870 6666

info@rcl.ac.uk

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

School of Allied Health

School of Computing and AI

Course Types

Higher National Diplomas

Foundation Year Routes

Foundation Degrees

Bachelors Degrees

Top Up Degrees

Masters Degrees

FACILITIES

Our Central London college is a new, well equipped facility, with good transport links and surrounded by a network of businesses from around the globe. We have a range of resources available to students to help them enjoy and thrive on location. As our Central London location is perfectly built upon the soils of a great City, there are a range of Transport Links available to it.

The closest Tube Stations to Great Titchfield Street are: Great Portland Street, Oxford Street, Baker Street, Warren Street, Euston Tube Station, Euston Square Station, Regents Park Station and Goodge Street Station. All stations offer a range of Tube Lines including, Metropolitan, Central, Bakerloo, Victoria, Circle, Hammersmith and City and Northern Lines. In addition, there are multiple bus routes to help students travel to and from the campus, including the, 88, 453, C2, N18, 18, 27, 30 and 205 buses.

ADDRESS

Regent Hill House
153 Great Titchfield Street
Fitzrovia
London
W1W 5BD

Central London Location

Why study with Regent College London – Central London?

We may be a little biased here, but Regent College London is the place to study. From thorough student loan guidance to flexible classes, weve created a little list of reasons to study with us:

Flexible Study Classes: Morning, Evening and Weekend Classes help you fit your studies around busy life commitments.

High Experienced Tutors: We have some of the best tutors within the Education Sector whom deliver engaging lessons to our students. In addition, small class sizes ensure 1-2-1 advice and help when needed.

Campus Locations with Strong Transport Links: Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital in Wembley, Kingsbury, Harrow, Southall and Central London; all with a tube station or bus stop located 5 Minutes or less from them. We have modern buildings with excellent facilities and resources for our students. Our campus locations are based in vibrant communities with great culture and exciting lunch spots!

Student Support: We have phenomenal student support teams across all locations to help with any queries from student loans, UCAS Applications, Careers Advice and general questions.

Read more

Regent Digital Services

How to Apply?

Studying at Regent College

Student Advice Hub

What our students say

Shirley Edokpolor

BSc (Hons) in Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

I will strongly recommend Regent College as they have shown me how to be confident in myself and also taught me how to achieve my aims and goals in my chosen career.

Prakash Mandalia

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

Rashed Haider

BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

Florin Micu

BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

Very responsive staff and easy-going, helpful and experienced tutors. Teaching is of high quality. I find the classes organized and i am happy with the way things are going.

Galin Gavrailov

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

I would recommend the college because of the professionalism shown by the tutors and the attention they give to us students, so we thatcan progress. They are also very friendly and when we dont understand something they spend time to explain the concepts to us properly.

Abdirahman Farah

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

Emilia D. Slatineanu

HND

I am one of those people who came on Regent College London with high goals. I became one of the students representative and as I hoped, it was a great journey with Regent College for the last 3 years. I had all the support starting from the tutors who were absolutely wonderful in supporting me. Also the staff members from the reception and from the offices were absolutely punctual and receptive to all our problems. So I would like to point out that it is a wonderful place to successfully complete your studies and go on with a career! Thank you Regent College for being there!

 

Winsome Reid

HND

I think the course so far has exceeded my expectations, the teachers really do explain things well. If I dont understand something, I know that I can go to any of my teachers and they will be able to break it down to me and offer me the additional support that I need. The best part of the course so far has been meeting like minded people, the teaching and, of course, the content of the course. I really enjoy learning about the different components of business and how businesses function optimally to generate revenue. I would definitely recommend the course and encourage anyone interested in business to go forward and study a HND with Regent College London.

 

Lily Ndosimao

BSc Health and Social Care (UOB)

It is my first year at Regent college studying a degree in Health and Social Care. The teaching is excellent and the environment is so clean which makes it a better place to study. I honestly like the staff because they are so polite. I am so lucky to studying here honestly.

 

Csilla Raduly

HND

I choose Regent College to study because it was recommended to me by a friend, who attends here. Enrolling and starting studying went very smoothly. I am very happy I got the chance to take the HND Business class, as my plan for the future is to run my own business. I am looking forward to making the best of this class and continue my studies to get my Bachelors Degree. Regent College offers great teachers, kind and polite. It also brought new friends, which I am grateful for.

 

The post Central London appeared first on Regent College London.

item.title: Harrow
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post Harrow appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Our Campus

Harrow

Our location at Harrow is on Imperial Drive, Rayners Lane and boasts modern classrooms, IT labs and state-of-the-art facilities designed for strong educational progression. Just a few minutes walk from Rayners Lane tube station and with a host of leading retail chains on its doorstep, the location is ideal for students who enjoy having everything close at hand.

Rayners Lane offers a great community with local shops surrounding the campus, giving students a fantastic range of lunch spots, hosted with familiar friendly faces.

Contacts

+44 (0)203 870 6666

info@rcl.ac.uk

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

School of Allied Health

School of Computing and AI

Course Types

Higher National Diplomas

Foundation Year Routes

Foundation Degrees

Bachelors Degrees

Top Up Degrees

FACILITIES

Our Harrow campus is a well-equipped facility, with good transport links and surrounded by a network of local businesses. We have a range of resources available to students to help them enjoy and thrive on location.

TRAVEL/TRANSPORT

As our Harrow location is on a High Street, there are a range of Transport Links available to it. The closest Tube Stations to London Road are: Rayners Lane Station, West Harrow Station and North Harrow Station. All stations above offer a range of Tube Lines including, Metropolitan and Piccadilly Lines. In addition, there are multiple bus routes to help students travel to and from the location including the, H9, H10, H11, H12, and 398 buses.

ADDRESSES

Regent House
167 Imperial Drive
Harrow
Middlesex
HA2 7HD

Carmine Court
202 Imperial Drive
Harrow
Middlesex
HA2 7HG

OPENING TIMES

Monday to Friday – 9am to 5pm

(We are available on the phone 02038706666 and email info@rcl.ac.uk from 9am to 6pm Monday to Friday)

 

Harrow Location

Why study with Regent College London – Harrow?

We may be a little biased here, but Regent College London is the place to study. From thorough student loan guidance to flexible classes, weve created a little list of reasons to study with us:

Flexible Study Classes: Morning, Evening and Weekend Classes help you fit your studies around busy life commitments.

High Experienced Tutors: We have some of the best tutors within the Education Sector whom deliver engaging lessons to our students. In addition, small class sizes ensure 1-2-1 advice and help when needed.

Campus Locations with Strong Transport Links: Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital in Wembley, Kingsbury, Harrow, Southall and Central London; all with a tube station or bus stop located 5 Minutes or less from them. We have modern buildings with excellent facilities and resources for our students. Our campus locations are based in vibrant communities with great culture and exciting lunch spots!

Student Support: We have phenomenal student support teams across all locations to help with any queries from student loans, UCAS Applications, Careers Advice and general questions.

Read more

Regent Digital Services

How to Apply?

Studying at Regent College

Student Advice Hub

What our students say

Dorinel Barbanta

BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

Robert Masasa

BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

Regent College London is the best college in London because since I started studying there I can see they have the best teachers. The teaching is good and helpful and they are also really organised. If you have any problem in the college, the Student Services team is always is there to help you. For me, I think Regent College London is the best College in London.

Rashed Haider

BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

Florin Micu

BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

Very responsive staff and easy-going, helpful and experienced tutors. Teaching is of high quality. I find the classes organized and i am happy with the way things are going.

Andreea-Loredana Costea

BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

The lecturers teach and explain modules in the best way possible so that students can understand. The recruitment staff are very nice and very helpful every time you have a problem. Quick problem solving and efficient service from the start to the end at Regent College London.

Galin Gavrailov

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

I would recommend the college because of the professionalism shown by the tutors and the attention they give to us students, so we thatcan progress. They are also very friendly and when we dont understand something they spend time to explain the concepts to us properly.

Abdirahman Farah

BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

Lily Ndosimao

BSc Health and Social Care (UOB)

It is my first year at Regent college studying a degree in Health and Social Care. The teaching is excellent and the environment is so clean which makes it a better place to study. I honestly like the staff because they are so polite. I am so lucky to studying here honestly.

 

Ameen Olorunnimbe

HND

I am very happy that I chose Regent College London. It is a fantastic college. The tutors are ready to listen to the students and they teach you to their best ability. I have enjoyed every moment here. They have great facilities, books and computers. I was lucky to have made Regent College London my choice. Regent College London is in my heart. (Successfully enrolled onto the 3rd year of a business course at University of West London)

 

Stefka Zamfirova

HND

My name is Stefka Zamfirova and I completed the HND in Business Level 5 in Regent College London. I enjoyed my study and these two years from January 2014 to December 2015 have become unique and unforgettable memories when I think of it. My lecturers were great and helpful. I can positively say that studying at Regent College London helped me to develop my knowledge, to discover more about myself and to make more friends. The college increased my personal confidence before starting my university life.

 

Adriana Unguras

HND

Thank you for all the support given while I studied here and honestly you helped me raise my wings and fly. Some of the staff encouraged me to continue my studies even though I was pregnant and dreaming only at a family life for the next years. They encouraged me and I followed their advice even if I felt unsecure and incapable to manage my time between studies and university. Moreover, this year I will graduate from university and Im planning to continue my studies with a train to teach scheme. I am grateful that I trusted you and all the team to guide me for a brighter future.

 

The post Harrow appeared first on Regent College London.
